turkish_example_sentence: Onlar hiperaktif çocuklar nadiren sakin ve ciddi konular hakkında düşünmezler.
english_example_sentence: They hyperactive children rarely think about calm and serious topics.
russian_example_sentence: Они гиперактивные дети редко думают о спокойных и серьезных темах.
